item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello! This is where I say hello

item.title: ABOUT
item.description: Hi I’m Tom, you can find out a little about me… I code professionally for Intilery (Java, JavaScript, AWS, Python), and for fun with sounds or with my son (Supercollider, Clojure; Unity, C#). I’m learning to play piano, and like to mix this up with some Maschine 3 beats. I keep fit with kick boxking and tai-chi, and when I can I’ll be out sailing at Budworth SC. As well as looking after my kids, I live with 2 cats and my wife; the smallest cat, Cleo is pictured snoozing below:
